sql.value: SELECT t.* FROM ((SELECT o.* FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id IN (%s, %s))) t ORDER BY t.order_id
SELECT t.* FROM ((SELECT i.* FROM t_order o, t_order_item i WHERE o.order_id = i.order_id and o.order_id IN (%s, %s))) t ORDER BY t.item_id
SELECT COUNT(1) as orders_count FROM (SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id desc) t
SELECT COUNT(1) as order_items_count FROM (SELECT order_id FROM t_order_item GROUP BY order_id) t
